name: Swab (Andrew Pearson)
description:
Create waves of colour and mix them together to battle enemies in this different take on the traditional tower-defence genre; Swab!

By forming waves and having the colours overlap as they hit the enemies track, the colour is saved, and when a matching enemy hits this saved colour, they are destroyed.

Should an enemy get to the end you lose one life, and losing them all results in a defeat.

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Click hexes to start a wave of the selected colour

Q - Select Red

W - Selects Green

E - Selects Blue
